pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Valen's $(l:gavv/arsenal/valenbuster)Valenbuster$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Valen's $(l:gavv/riders/valen#chocodon)Chocodon$(/l) form
